---
title: Xerox
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: xerox
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $13.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Xerox. The average
  contract duration was 4.03 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $80.7K. The longest
  contract was 12.76 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $28.4M.
lookup_name: 'XEROX'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '13.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '1,720'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '322'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '19%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '38%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.57'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '18.7M'
s424_mean_duration: '4.03'
s421_mean_contract_value: '80.7K'
s425_max_duration: '12.76'
s422_max_contract_value: '28.4M'
---
